slogan1: Because your little friend deserves the best care, we are here to take care of him at every moment.
slogan2: Vaccination and treatment schedules… made easy!
sub_slogan2: Keep track of your pet's health file, and receive automatic reminders so you don't miss any appointments.
enter_code_message: Enter the code we sent to your number 012345*****
verification_code_resent: The access code has been sent to your account. Please check your email and verify.
shop_book_consult: Shop, book, and consult the doctor
reset_password_instruction: Enter the email or phone number linked to your account, and we’ll send you a password reset code.
resetPasswordDescription: Enter a new password and make sure it's strong and easy for you.
search_doctor_store_service: Search for a doctor, store, or service
discount_offer: 20% off on pet supplies from our store
nearest_doctor: Nearest doctor available now within 2 km
